info.title: PRMS Normalizer API
info.description: Validates, normalizes and publishes results to EventBridge. Supports: Knowledge Products, Capacity Sharing, Innovation Development, Innovation Use, Other Output, Other Outcome, and Policy Change.

lead_center.name: Alliance of Bioversity International and CIAT

data.title: Improved seed varieties adoption in drylands
data.description: This knowledge product summarizes adoption barriers and enabling factors across regions to inform policy and practice for smallholders in drylands.

patch.description: Calls the upstream API to update the result and then synchronizes the OpenSearch documents. If no documents exist, a new one is indexed with the updated payload.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Result identifier provided by the external API

data.title: Updated knowledge product title
data.description: Short description for the updated record.

data.title: Updated knowledge product title
data.description: Short description for the updated record.

delete.description: Calls the upstream API to delete the result and then removes it from OpenSearch indices.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Result identifier provided by the external API

tenant.description: Tenant identifier responsible for the result

jobId.description: Optional job identifier to correlate updates

received_at.description: Override for the received timestamp stored in OpenSearch

data.description: Partial payload with the fields to update
